channel.title: wonslung Fire Stick help
channel.description: Recent content on wonslung Fire Stick help

item.title: wonslung Fire Sticks
item.description: Thanks for buying a wonslung Fire Stick Table of Contents: Getting Started What’s in the Box Connecting the Fire Stick The Remote Connecting to wifi Navigating FireOS Kodi Frequently Asked Questions Trouble Shooting by wonslung

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: What’s in the box Amazon documentation USB power cable Fire Tv Alexa remote Amazon Fire Stick HDMI adapter dongle USB power adapter Connecting the Fire Stick Hint you can use a powered usb port instead of the wall adapter if your television has one The Remote Using the remote is pretty simple. Use the navigation buttons to move through menus. Use the select button to select highlighted menu item.

item.title: Navigating Fire Os
item.description:
Navigating Menus Use the navigation button on the remote to move through the menus. You can always return to the “Home” Menu by pushing the ⌂ (Home) button on the remote
Most users want to get into Kodi Immediately. This is done by navigating down to “My Apps and Games” from the “Home” menu and selecting the Kodi App. Menu Options Attention Unless you have Amazon Prime™ The “Your Videos, Movies, and TV Shows” will cost money.

item.title: Kodi
item.description: What is Kodi? Kodi is software designed to serve as a media center. With 3rd party addons, it can play almost any type of video file and stream media from all over the internet. (3rd party addons are not affliated or supported by the kodi development team) First Start When you first start Kodi please allow 60-90 seconds before attempting use. How to navigate Kodi Note These instructions are specific to the wonslung FireStick Skin kodi build

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: How do i register my Fire Stick to my Amazon account? Make sure you have setup wifi Navigate to Settings Navigate to My Account and press the select button on your remote Press the select button on your remote to confirm Enter in your Amazon account information Do I need an Amazon Account to use a wonslung Fire Stick? I set up each wonslung Fire Stick with a placeholder amazon account.
